overview: With this little film, I betrayed myself a lot. I have constructed five paintings of sensual elements - pure and unclean, classic, romantic, and vulgar. Everything starts on a quasi-religious, quasi-spectacular, quasi-pagan level and is accompanied by undoubtedly exaggerated music. Towards the end, an excerpt from Barthes' Body of the Other, a little opera, a luxurious altar and then the falling of a curtain.
title: Antediluvian
